help.title: Frequently Asked Questions Q&A
help.modalTitle: Before You Ask: Please Think About Any Questions Yourself Before Asking. The Tone of the Answers Below is Relatively Rough, Which is Normal and Not Related to the BGI Author. Please Forgive Any Dissatisfaction or Contact the Author of This Page to Vent
help.author: Author Email: anqi4051{'@'}gmail.com

qa.q: Why Does the Repository Keep Failing to Load?
qa.a: The Repository Uses a GitHub Address, and Direct Connection in China May Be Intermittent, Which is Normal. If You Can't Open It, Try a Few More Times or Come Back in a Few Minutes. You Can Also Use the Local Repository Page of BGI. (If You Are a Magician, You Know What to Do)

qa.q: Why is the Comment Function Unavailable?
qa.a: Comments Are Not Supported in Local Mode. Please Visit the Online Repository and Log in to Your GitHub Account to Comment. Please Solve How to Use GitHub Yourself. No Guidance is Provided Here.

qa.q: Why is There No XX Script?
qa.a: After Searching Everything (All Four Lists), If There is No Such Script, Then No One Has Written This Script.

qa.q: How to Use the Subscribed Function?
qa.a: ‚ÄúBetterGI ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí BetterGI Http Server Settings‚Äù (If You Can't Find This Setting, Please Make Sure BGI is Updated to the Latest Version), Make Sure This Item is Enabled and the Port Number is Set to 30648. After Completion, Please Close This Page and Restart BGI to Try Again. If There Are Still Problems, Please Contact the Author to Solve It.

qa.q: What is README, Why Did It Fail to Load? Why is It Not Displayed?
qa.a: If You Ask What README is, Please Read README Once If You Have Studied Elementary School English üò°. The Loading Failure Situation is the Same as the First Question. It is Not Displayed Because the Script Author Did Not Write README or the README.md File is Named Incorrectly.

qa.q: Why Can't Some Links Be Opened? Why Does It Take So Long to Load?
Why is There No Response After Clicking Subscribe?
qa.a: Please Open BGI, and an Import Window Will Pop Up at This Time. Select Import. If You Are Using the Online Repository, Refresh the BGI Page and If There is No Script You Subscribed To, Please Update the Local Repository and Try Again. If There Are Still Exceptions, Please Ask in the Relevant Group.

qa.q: What Should I Do If This Script Doesn't Work?
qa.a: Please Ask in the Relevant Group. Specific Problems Should Be Analyzed Specifically. Make Sure Your Screenshots and Descriptions Are Sufficient When Asking Questions.

qa.q: Why Are My Previous Comments Gone?
qa.a: Generally, Comments Will Not Be Deleted. If the Comment Disappears, It is Likely That the Node Path You Commented on Has Changed. For Example, If the Crystal Mine Directory is Renamed to Crystal Water Mine, You Will See a New Comment Area.

qa.q: Why Doesn't This Script Use Nahida?
qa.a: Authors Need to Consider Whether Everyone Has It. If You Need It, Please Try to Make One Yourself.

qa.q: What Should I Do If I Want XX Function?
qa.a: If No Author Writes It, Then Write One Yourself!
Please Contact Me for More Questions. If There is Value, This Page Will Be Updated From Time to Time.
